snippet: Adjustable drivers can help golfers, but some teachers said that instruction was still necessary and that the clubs could be overwhelming for some people.
abstract: Adjustable drivers can help golfers, but some teachers said that instruction was still necessary and that the clubs could be overwhelming for some people.

headline.main: Adjustable Drivers Fix Some Problems While Posing Others
headline.print_headline: Drivers Fix Some Problems While Posing Others
